sentences.en: Give the new soldiers a demonstration again.
sentences.cn: 再给新士兵们演示一遍.

sentences.en: He gave a demonstration of the new technique then and there.
sentences.cn: 他当场表演了这种新的操作方法.

sentences.en: He stretched out both arms by way of demonstration.
sentences.cn: 我热切地望着他的手,那双手满是茧子,沾着新鲜的泥土.

sentences.en: His prose is everywhere a demonstration of brevity.
sentences.cn: 他的散文写得非常简练.

sentences.en: Photography with cine cameras is of value only for demonstration and entertainment purposes.
sentences.cn: 用电影摄影机摄影只有演示和娱乐的价值.

sentences.en: Police opened fire on a peaceful demonstration.
sentences.cn: 警察朝和平示威的人群开了枪。

sentences.en: Suddenly, a firecracker went off nearby - the signal to start the demonstration.
sentences.cn: 突然, 不远处响起了一声爆竹.这是信号!

sentences.en: Supporters staged a demonstration outside the US embassy.
sentences.cn: 支持者在美国大使馆外举行了示威游行。

sentences.en: That would be laying herself open to a demonstration.
The book is a demonstration of scholarship without pedantry.
sentences.cn: 这本书表现出学术水平又不故意卖弄学问.

sentences.en: The formal demonstration of system acceptability to obtain authorization for its operational use.
sentences.cn: 为使系统获准投入运行性使用,对系统的可接受性所做的正式演示.

sentences.en: They seem to me to partake little of the character of demonstration.
sentences.cn: 依我看来,他的论点似乎很少有例证的性质.

sentences.en: This is a clear demonstration of how technology has changed.
sentences.cn: 这清楚地表明了技术已有了怎样的进步。

sentences.en: This third demonstration was naturally a very important one for Marconi.
sentences.cn: 当然,这次实验对马可尼来说十分重要.

sentences.en: This was a very practical demonstration of why the Army trained people to be disciplined.
sentences.cn: 这很实际地说明了为什么军队要将士兵训练得遵规守纪。

sentences.en: Wait a moment, let me give you a demonstration.
sentences.cn: 且慢, 先让我做一下示范.

sentences.en: We watched a cookery demonstration at school.
sentences.cn: 我们在学校观看了烹调示范.
